I want Rattrap, Lunarpine may need a late night snack.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> (Big clap for JP! I may want Rattrap, but I'm still undecided.)
> 
> 
> Megatron:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Megatron stared coldly at the retreating Dracona. He bared his pure 
white 
> teeth at her. Intruding his the cave and threatening one or more of 
his 
> troops wasn't good on her side.
> 
> "Megatron, she grabbed something!" Terrorsaur shouted in alarm.
> 
> His eyes went wide. "Stop her you fools!" He thrusted out his 
blaster arm. 
> Terrorsaur took to the air, while the big wolf named Rowdy Wolf 
transformed 
> to robot mode and chased after her. He withdrew a large rifle and 
fired at 
> shot at Dracona.
> 
> Megatron jerked his head to Dark Mouse. "Fire the auto-guns!" he 
commanded. 
> "But shoot to disable."
>
